message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $11000. What do you think?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I really like the product. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $9500?
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $10200. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm getting closer to my target, but I'd like to get even closer. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $9800?
I'm glad you're getting closer to your target, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $10500. What do you think?
I'm really close to my budget, Alice. I'd like to make one more offer. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $9500?
I think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession. I can offer it to you for $10000. This is as low as I can go. What do you think?
